alert.note: Alert for Roseau (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 6:59PM CDT until July 13 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Forks has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Roseau County in northwestern Minnesota... * Until 745 PM CDT. * At 659 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Haug, or 23 miles west of Roseau, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Greenbush, Badger, Leo and Haug. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
